identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The identifier for this camera preset. The name must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace.

inherit_from.title: Camera Inheritor
inherit_from.description: Inherits the properties of the specified camera preset.

pos_x.title: X Position
pos_x.description: The offset of the camera on the X coordinate.

pos_y.title: Y Position
pos_y.description: The offset of the camera on the Y coordinate.

pos_z.title: Y Position
pos_z.description: The offset of the camera on the Y coordinate.

rot_x.title: X Rotation
rot_x.description: The pitch rotation of the camera, supports any value between -90 and 90.

rot_y.title: Y Rotation
rot_y.description: The yaw rotation of the camera.

listener.title: Listener
listener.description: Sets the audio system to use the player's position for audio positioning.

player_effects.title: Player Effects
player_effects.description: If false, will disable camera effects such as night vision or darkness. Defaults to true.
